title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch
description: Conditions are favorable for the development of severe thunderstorms with damaging winds and large hail.
instructions: Stay indoors during thunderstorms. Avoid windows and seek shelter in interior rooms. Do not use electrical appliances. If driving, pull over safely and wait for storms to pass. Monitor local weather conditions closely.

title: Winter Storm Warning
description: Heavy snow and blowing wind will create dangerous travel conditions with accumulations of 8-12 inches expected.
instructions: Avoid all non-essential travel. If you must travel, carry emergency supplies including water, food, blankets, and a flashlight. Keep vehicle gas tank full. Stay warm and check on elderly neighbors. Clear snow from vehicle exhaust pipe if stranded.

title: Heat Advisory
description: Dangerous heat index values up to 110Â°F expected due to high temperatures and humidity.
instructions: Limit outdoor activities during peak heat hours (10 AM - 6 PM). Drink plenty of water and take frequent breaks in air conditioning. Wear light-colored, loose-fitting clothing. Never leave children or pets in vehicles. Check on elderly relatives and neighbors.
